review_data.title: Delicious and a great value for Zürich!
review_data.content: Quaint decor and delicous pizza, an obviously local restaurant (not touristy). We ordered two pizzas and a salad, which was too much for the three of us. Luckily, they were happy to give us a takeaway box. The pizzas were a 12-14" size, well seasoned...More

review_data.title: Pizza al forno di pietra! The authentic!
review_data.content: Corallo is the authentic italian restaurant.Great food and awesome service. We ordered pizza and spagheti gamberri. Sooo tasty! When you enter in the restaurant you can feel the italian flair.We will come back.Be careful with the spicy oil. They call it "Petroleo" ;)

review_data.title: Better than in Italy!

review_data.title: (one of) the best pizza in town
review_data.content: I guess it's an Italian restaurant run by a family. I never asked, but I'm sure. And they make one of the best pizza in town. I never tried anything else, so this review is all about their pizza. Just try it yourself.

review_data.title: Worst carbonara in zurich

review_data.title: Excellent food friendly owners
